    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                    throws ConnectionPoolException,
                           DAOException,
                           FacadeException
        this method is used to purchase a coupon. gets a Coupon object as parameter, check it exists on the DB, and this customer didn't already purchase it in the past. also makes sure there is at least 1 coupon left for purchase, and it is not expired. if so- adds this coupon to this customer, and updates both it's amount and the income for the company who sold it.
        Parameters:
        coupon -
        Throws:
        ConnectionPoolException
        DAOException
        FacadeException
